title: Render lesson section preview as sanitized rich text

requirements.summary: Render the lesson preview content at the specified XPath as sanitized rich text (not literal HTML tags) without changing any other UI elements.
acceptanceCriteria: The UI element at the provided XPath renders basic HTML formatting (bold/italic/underline, lists, links) as rich text.
The UI element at the provided XPath no longer displays literal angle-bracket HTML tags to the user.
Rendered HTML is sanitized using the existing frontend sanitization approach (e.g., frontend/src/utils/safeHtml.ts) so that scripts/event handlers are not executed.
No other sections/elements on the page are changed as part of this request.

file_operations.description: Change only the lesson content preview rendering inside the CardDescription (the element corresponding to the provided XPath) to render sanitized rich HTML instead of interpolating the raw string. Use the existing sanitizeHtml utility from frontend/src/utils/safeHtml.ts and render via dangerouslySetInnerHTML so basic tags like b/i/u/ul/li/a display as formatted rich text while scripts/event handlers are removed. Keep all other surrounding layout/structure and other page elements unchanged.
